metadata.name: Referral Cheat Sheet
metadata.value:
Here is what to consider when thinking about who to refer:
3+ years of leadership and demonstrated results in agroforestry, restoration, or related domains in Sub-Saharan Africa
Exceptional written and verbal communication to engage a range of audiences, including rural farmers, internal staff, external partners, and organizational leadership
Familiarity with biodiversity projects or nature-based carbon projects is an additional advantage
University or advanced degree in agroforestry, ecology, restoration, or related fields
Familiarity with nature-based carbon projects, including implementation and certification is an additional advantage"

metadata.name: Expected Manager (you can leave this blank)
Referral Cheat Sheet
metadata.value:
Here is what to consider when thinking about who to refer:

"Minimum of 3 Years Experience is Supply chain Management: Proficiency in understanding and optimizing supply chain processes, including warehouse operations, logistics, inventory management, distribution, procurement and health and safety		
People Management: Demonstrated ability to manage a minimum of 4 people with a good inter-personal relationship		
Demand Forecasting: Ability to use predictive analytics to estimate demand for our programs (credit, retail and trees)		
Critical and Problem Solving Skills: Ability to identify issues and risks within the supply chain and develop solutions to address them promptly and effectively. Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to improve supply chain efficiency and effectiveness and strong knowledge of analytical tools, e.g. google sheet, BI		""		
Supply Chain Management Tools: Familiarity with supply chain tools and systems  such as Warehouse Management System, SAP, Odoo to to track inventory, manage orders, and streamline operations

jobs.title: Tupande Impact Strategy and Operations Associate (Fixed-Term)

metadata.name: Expected Manager (you can leave this blank)
Referral Cheat Sheet
metadata.value:
Here is what to consider when thinking about who to refer:
"Strong academic or professional experience designing and implementing evaluations  and analysing data  (e.g. with large scale data collection and field team management).
Knowledge of evaluation concepts and mastery of experimental and quasi-experimental evaluation designs.
Strong analytical skills, especially the use of statistical techniques leveraged in impact evaluation measurement strategies (e.g.   propensity score matching, difference in difference, regression discontinuity, etc.).
Knowledge of statistical software, such as  Stata or R).
Strong project management skills with the ability to oversee multiple projects with various levels of complexity at the same time. 
Has a clear and compelling written communication style with an eye for design and visual presentation. 
Ability to engage with multiple partners in a diplomatic manner and have strong relationship building skills. 
Leadership experience, including managing a team. "

metadata.name: Expected Manager (you can leave this blank)
Referral Cheat Sheet
metadata.value:
Here is what to consider when thinking about who to refer:
The Strategy & Operations Associate will work at the intersection of strategy and execution: turning big ideas into real operations, from running field pilots and managing supplier partnerships to building systems that ensure quality, traceability, and profitability. They will play a key role in building the next frontier of Tupande’s impact — helping design, test, and scale new value chains that diversify farmer income beyond traditional staples.

metadata.name: Expected Manager (you can leave this blank)
Referral Cheat Sheet
metadata.value:
Here is what to consider when thinking about who to refer:
"We are looking for candidates with the following qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Data Science, Analytics, Applied Mathematics, Quantitative Economics, or another relevant field.

5+ years of experience in a strategic data and/or analytical role.

Technology skills / fluency: 
- Advanced Google Sheets / Excel (can develop and maintain complex spreadsheets), Google Workspace & Microsoft Office.
- Strong statistics and analytical skills and experience in R, CommCare, Kobo and other data collection, analysis and data visualization tools will be key.""
Strong project management - exceptional judgment and ability to manage and balance multiple strategic projects and priorities at once. Demonstrated ability working across teams and functions on technical projects
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 
Proven experience managing and upskilling a team."

metadata.name: Referral Cheat Sheet
metadata.value:
Here is what to consider when thinking about who to refer:
Seeking a project-focused agronomist to manage field trials and research in Zambia. Coordinate complex agricultural experiments, troubleshoot field challenges, and generate evidence-based recommendations to increase farmer yields and profitability.The hiring manager is prioritizing operational grit over theoretical knowledge. They explicitly state that Project Management is the top priority, while deep agronomy is a "plus" that can be trained if the candidate is sharp.
